title: You Can Buy Bitcoin At A Discount, If You Trust The SEC To Be Rational
author: Steven Ehrlich
description: The clock is ticking on a limited-time offer to get bitcoin on the cheap. Whether it turns out to be a bargain depends on the actions of an intransigent regulator.

title: Crypto Darling Helium Promised A ‘People’s Network.’ Instead, Its Executives Got Rich.
author: Sarah Emerson
description: Helium was touted as the best real-world use case of Web3 technology. But a Forbes investigation found that executives and their friends quietly hoarded the majority of wealth at the project's inception.

title: ‘The Devil In Nerd’s Clothes’: How Sam Bankman-Fried’s Cult Of Genius Fooled Everyone
author: David Jeans
description: Crypto insiders paint a picture of a charismatic tech founder who became the darling of high-powered investors, even as he was brazen about his cryptocurrency exchange’s shaky business model and kept the books closed to all but a few confidants.

title: A16z Crypto Leads $14 Million Bet On Rye, New Web3 Commerce Startup From Justin Kan
author: Alex Konrad
description: Cofounded by ex-Twitch cofounder Kan and five others, Rye is promising merchants online sales at a lower cut, due to a crypto token project. A16z crypto, Solana Ventures and others have poured $14 million in, pre-launch.

title: Meet The 21-Year-Old Dropout Turned Web3 Founder - And Raised $3.2 Million In 6 Months
author: Derick David
description: The company, which Arnav calls “Quickbooks for crypto”, is only 6 months old has now raised a total of $3.2 million with support from world-class investors like Lattice Capital, Founders, Inc.

title: New Lawsuit Alleging That Solana Is A Security Could Have Big Implications For The Crypto Investment Landscape
author: Rosemarie Miller
description: Solana Labs is facing a class action lawsuit after an investor claims its key players are making illegal profits.

title: Helium, The A16Z-Backed Crypto Unicorn, Spars With Binance Over Delisting
author: David Jeans
description: Binance told Forbes it delists tokens to protect its users, and periodically reviews “each digital asset we list to ensure that it continues to meet a high level of standard.”

title: Andreessen Horowitz's Crypto Lobbying Blitz Is Paying Off
author: David Jeans
description: Partners at A16Z held a fundraiser for New York congressman Ritchie Torres. Soon after, he pressured an industry group that threatened to derail a portfolio company.

title: ‘Solana Killer’—A Radical New $2 Billion ‘Facebook Spinoff’ Cryptocurrency Is Coming Despite The Huge Bitcoin, Ethereum And Crypto Price Crash
author: Billy Bambrough
description: A new, highly-anticipated cryptocurrency project that's valued at $2 billion by top venture capital backers has launched to much fanfare...

title: Multicoin Dives Into Sliding Market With $430 Million Blockchain Venture Fund
author: Dylan Sloan
description: Austin-based firm targets small deals for Texas-sized returns.
